tool_description: Generates demand forecasts for products based on historical sales data using configurable forecasting methods and time horizons.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs to generate forecasts for

historical_start_date.description: Start date for historical data analysis

historical_end_date.description: End date for historical data analysis

forecast_horizon_days.description: Number of days to forecast into the future (1-365)

forecasting_method.description: Method to use: moving_average, exponential_smoothing, arima, or auto

include_seasonality.description: Whether to account for seasonal patterns in forecasting

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: At least 30 days of sales history required for accurate forecasting. Extend historical date range.
Invalid date range: historical_start_date must be before historical_end_date. Correct date parameters.
Forecast horizon too long: forecast_horizon_days must be between 1-365. Reduce forecast period.
Invalid forecasting method: Use one of [moving_average, exponential_smoothing, arima, auto].
Invalid confidence level: confidence_level must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
usage: Provide product IDs, historical date range, and forecast horizon. The tool analyzes sales patterns and generates demand predictions with confidence intervals.

forecast_values.description: Predicted demand values for each day in the forecast horizon

confidence_intervals.description: Upper and lower confidence bounds for each forecast period

seasonality_detected.description: Whether seasonal patterns were identified in the data

forecast_accuracy.description: Historical accuracy score of the forecasting method used
